oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Roy Harper with Sid Harkreader and Sam McGee
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Roy Harper (center) of Manchester, TN, is pictured here with Grand Ole Opry stalwarts "Fiddlin'" Sid Harkreader and Sam McGee, 1970s.
Date field reflects acquisition of photo as exact data on date of image is undetermined. Harper is a 2003 recipient of the Tennessee Folklife Heritage Award.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Harkreader, Sid; Harper, Roy; McGee, Sam
Music: country
Anglo-American
